find_package(Eigen3 REQUIRED)
# Add as "system headers" to avoid warnings generated by them with
# compilers that support that notion.
include_directories(SYSTEM ${EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR})

find_package(Qt4 COMPONENTS QtCore QtGui QtOpenGL REQUIRED)
include_directories(SYSTEM ${QT_INCLUDES})
add_definitions(${QT_DEFINITIONS})

# Headers for our public API
set(HEADERS
  basisset.h
  gaussianset.h
  slaterset.h
)

# Source files for our data.
set(SOURCES
  basisset.cpp
#  basissetloader.cpp
#  cube.cpp
#  gamessukout.cpp
#  gamessus.cpp
#  gaussianfchk.cpp
  gaussianset.cpp
#  molden.cpp
#  mopacaux.cpp
  slaterset.cpp
)

qt4_wrap_cpp(mocSOURCES basisset.h gaussianset.h slaterset.h)

avogadro_add_library(AvogadroQuantum ${HEADERS} ${SOURCES} ${mocSOURCES})
target_link_libraries(AvogadroQuantum
  AvogadroCore
  AvogadroQtGui
  ${QT_QTCORE_LIBRARY})
